rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Te deum patrem ingenitum te filium unigenitum
te spiritum sanctum paraclitum te spiritum sanctum
sanctam et individuam sancta et individua trinitatem toto corde et ore confitemur laudamus atque benedicimus tibi gloria in saecula

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody: Quoniam magnus es tu et faciens mirabilia tu es deus solus

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
